Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Fumeiyoshi]{Fumeiyoshi}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Kabriri]{Kabriri}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Mahathallah]{Mahathallah}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Nhimbaloth]{Nhimbaloth}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Urgathoa]{Urgathoa}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Zura]{Zura}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Zyphus]{Zyphus}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Touch of Undeath]{Touch of Undeath}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Malignant Sustenance]{Malignant Sustenance}

Your magic carries close ties to the undead.
name: Undeath Domain
